name: preapproval_letter_uploader
title: Please upload your Pre-approval letter from your lender.
label: Uploader
description: If you don't have the documents ready, you can skip for now.
tips: A pre-approval letter is an official document from your lender stating how much they're willing to lend you for a home purchase.
small_print: The pre-approval letter should be dated within the last 60 days and include the type of pre-approval and the approved loan amount.

internal.notes: Initial question about pre-approval letter availability

preapproval_letter_uploader.name: preapproval_letter_uploader

suggested.hint: Since you chose to provide a pre-approval letter as part of your offer, uploading will be required to complete your offer.
